ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: NoMethodCallsAsArguments
rule.message: Never use method calls directly as arguments. Extract method calls to variables first
rule.description: Method calls should not be used directly as arguments to constructors, method calls, or expressions. Extract method calls to variables first for better readability and debugging.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //MethodCallExpression[ (parent::MethodCallExpression or parent::NewObjectExpression or ancestor::MethodCallExpression[position() > 1] or ancestor::NewObjectExpression) and not(ancestor::VariableDeclaration[VariableExpression]) and not(ancestor::AssignmentExpression[VariableExpression]) and not(parent::VariableDeclaration) ] | //NewObjectExpression[.//MethodCallExpression]/MethodCallExpression
